Atomic structure calculation

julia>  a = 11

One can access the doc strings as

JAC.Level()
Level: J = 0, M = 0, parity = plus, index = 0 
energy:         0.0  
relativeOcc:    0.0  
hasStateRep:    false  
basis:           (level.basis)  
mc:             Float64[]
